name: W Budapest
description: Beyond the urban fairytale, awaits an unmatched experience of the city dubbed the Queen of the Danube River. Bold design covers this UNESCO heritage site through 151 stylish guest rooms, including 45 suites. Blending history with modern luxury, you'll stay between ballet and beats, elegance and edge, established and avant-garde. Elevate your nights in underground bars and unlock secret doors to your most intriguing imagination. Why truth or dare when you can have both?Marriott

name: Verno House
description: Set in Budapest and with St. Stephen's Basilica reachable within 400 metres, Verno House offers concierge services, allergy-free rooms, a restaurant, free WiFi and a bar. This 5-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. There is a spa and wellness centre with a terrace, fitness centre and sauna, as well as a hot tub. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Verno House provides certain units with city views, and each room includes a kettle. At the accommodation all rooms come with bed linen and towels. An American breakfast is available every morning at Verno House. The area is popular for cycling, and bike hire and car hire are available at the hotel. Popular points of interest near Verno House include Hungarian State Opera, Dohany Street Synagogue and House of Terror. The nearest airport is Budapest Ferenc Liszt International, 14 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Rubin Wellness & Conference Hotel
description: Surrounded by greenery in the Buda part of Budapest, Rubin Wellness & Conference Hotel is 2.5 km from the Citadel and the castle district. It features a wellness centre and free Wi-Fi in rooms. Access to the 2400 m2 wellness area is free of charge for guests. The area includes a swimming pool, hot tub, sauna, salt-, aroma-, and steam cabin. Canapé beds and deck chairs can be used in the relaxation area. Rubin Wellness & Conference Hotel houses a restaurant and a cosy bar serving snacks such as sandwiches, pastries, tea and coffee. A hot buffet breakfast is served each morning. The property is well-connected to the city centre. The next bus stop is just 100 metres away and the M1 and M7 motorways are easily accessible.

name: Kempinski Hotel Corvinus Budapest
description: Located centrally in Budapest, Kempinski Hotel Corvinus Budapest is minutes on foot from Deak Ferenc Ter Station and provides a swimming pool and a Finnish sauna. It offers 5-star accommodation and views of the city. Guests can enjoy a range of massage treatments and beauty therapy at the in-house spa, Kempinski The Spa. Facilities include free wireless internet and body treatments. Those staying at the property can also enjoy city views from the in-house gym. After a day of sightseeing in the local region, guests can unwind in the comfort of their air conditioned rooms. They all feature a desk and an in-room safe. Guests of Corvinus Kempinski Budapest are welcome to experience Japanese cuisine at Nobu, or try local dishes at ÉS Bisztró-Brasserie. Afternoon tea is served daily at The Living Room. Guests can also enjoy a drink at Blue Fox The Bar. Hotel Corvinus Kempinski is located in the heart of Budapest’s entertainment district with restaurants, cafés and nightlife on the doorstep. Buda Castle is easily reached by car.Revato

name: The Ritz-Carlton, Budapest
description: Located in the heart of the cultural and shopping district, The Ritz-Carlton, Budapest is minutes away from historic sites and the Danube River. The luxury hotel is housed within a protected building, offering spacious, contemporary interiors, 171 elegant rooms and 29 suites and the Club Lounge as an additional sanctuary. Club Lounge provides guests with an elevated experience with dedicated concierge and food presentations throughout the day. Situated on the same floor, The Ritz-Carlton Spa awaits with a wide variety of unique treatments, thermal suite, a design pool area flooded with natural daylight and a 24h gymnasium. While DSK Wine & Grill restaurant serves Hungarian-inspired dishes and international favourites along with a great selection of rich local wines and craft cocktauls, the Kupola Lounge is the ideal place for a rich breakfast or a relaxed Afternoon Tea, and Kupola bar is focusing on innovative cocktails and tapas style bites. The facilities are completed with a ballroom and four flexible meeting rooms with state of the art technology.Official Hotel Information

name: Danubius Hotel Helia
description: The Danubius Hotel Helia can be found right on the banks of the Danube river opposite Budapest's Margaret Island and offers you great fitness, spa and conference facilities. Budapest's historic city centre can be reached within 15 minutes from the Danubius Hotel Helia. Choose from nicely furnished, non-smoking rooms, most of them overlooking the Danube river, Budapest's Margaret Island and the Buda hills. Plunge into the large pool and enjoy the breathtaking panorama from the 2-storey fitness club! There is a spacious car and bus park just outside the hotel. medical treatments, physical exercise, and medical examinations are also available at the hotel for an additional fee. The sauna is not co-ed.

name: Aquaworld Resort Budapest
description: Aquaworld Resort Budapest wellness and family friendly hotel is offering services unique in Budapest: it has 309 rooms, the main building has standard rooms, junior suites, family rooms and apartments. Free, unlimited internet access (Wi-Fi) in the entire premises of the hotel, as well as free outdoor car park for over 1000 cars await the arriving guests. The complex houses a three-leveled Oriental Spa wellness and fitness centre for those longing for relaxation, Bongo Kids Club for the youngest visitors and one of Europes grandest indoor water theme parks, Aquaworld for the adventurous. Aquaworld is directly accessible from the hotel. The water amusement park offers unforgettable entertainment for every age group all year round. The suspension bridges, towers and pools surrounding the replica of Angkor Wat temple provide a breathtaking sight. Visitors are transformed into explorers and can feel as if theyve fallen into a new world: tropical atmosphere, suspension bridges, palm trees, whirlpool, mountain stream, 17 indoor and outdoor kiddy and amusement pools. Adventure and adrenalin rush is guaranteed with 11 different slides, surf pool, diving and floating balls. A playground, childrens pools, childrens play corner and the Bongo Kids Club with supervision await our youngest guests.iHotelier/iStay

name: Anantara New York Palace Budapest
description: The 5* Anantara New York Palace Budapest Hotel is situated on Erzsébet Körút boulevard. Conveniently close to the Madach Theatre, Hungarian State Opera House and the famed Chain Bridge. The Blaha Lujza underground station is a short walk away and Budapest Airport can be reached by car in 30 minutes. The building spans seven floors filled with 185 rooms, where tea and coffee facilities, large flat-screen TVs and complimentary Wi-Fi come as standard. A range of rooms and suites are available with sweeping views over the city. Guests can choose from the hotel’s two restaurants, the New York Café and the Salon Restaurant or a bar menu at the Nyugat Bar. The hotel’s spa and gym offer guests the chance to relax and rejuvenate away from the city.NH Hoteles

name: Lions Garden Hotel
description: Featuring a free spa area and a restaurant, the boutique-style Lion's Garden Hotel is located in Budapest, 150 metres from the City Park. The new Museum of Ethnography, the House of Hungarian Music and the Heroe Square at the end of the Andrassy Avenue are in walking distance. Keleti Railway Station and the NEW Puskás Ferenc Stadium are both within 800 metres, while the Papp László Sports Arena and Arena Plaza are within 1.5 km from the property. The hotel is located in the diplomatic quarter, close to many embassies and faces to the 100-year-old Dominican Church. The spa facilities including a swimming pool, a hot tub and a sauna, are available free of charge (different opening hours!). Massage can be booked with the property for a surcharge. On the 6th floor we offer our NEW room type; DELUXE double room with balcony and shower.

name: Ensana Grand Margaret Island
description: Built in 1873 on the lush green and quiet Margaret Island in the centre of Budapest, the Ensana Grand Margaret Island offers a spacious spa area with a selection of treatments. A heated underground corridor connects the hotel to the neighbouring Ensana Thermal Margaret Island, which features one of Europe's top health spas. A hot tub, 2 pools, and various saunas and beauty treatments can be enjoyed there. The diagnostic section features various therapeutic treatments. Guests can access the spa area free of charge. The Széchenyi Restaurant offers fine dining with magnificent views of the park. International, domestic and diet cuisine, with a wide selection of Hungary's best wines, are served. Outdoor dining can be enjoyed in summer on the terrace and in the garden. In the evenings, a gypsy orchestra provides entertainment. The classically furnished rooms overlook the Danube or the magnificent park. They are all air-conditioned and have a minibar. The island stretches over 4 km and is protected leafy botanical parkland with ancient trees, a Japanese garden, and a rose garden, an open-air amphitheatre, traversed by walking and jogging tracks. Bicycles, horses, carts and electric buggies can be hired to get around. It is only a 15-minute drive away from the centre of Budapest.

name: Kozmo Hotel Suites & Spa
description: Situated in Budapest, 1.2 km from Hungarian National Museum, Kozmo Hotel Suites & Spa - The Leading Hotels of the World features accommodation with a fitness centre, private parking, a terrace and a restaurant. Boasting a bar, the hotel is close to several noted attractions, around 1.6 km from Keleti Pályaudvar Metro Station, 1.7 km from Keleti Railway Station and 1.6 km from Dohany Street Synagogue. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Each room is equipped with a kettle, while certain rooms are fitted with a kitchen with a fridge. At Kozmo Hotel Suites & Spa - The Leading Hotels of the World rooms have bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a gluten-free breakfast. You can play billiards at this 5-star hotel, and car hire is available. Blaha Lujza Square is less than 1 km from Kozmo Hotel Suites & Spa - The Leading Hotels of the World, while House of Terror is 2.7 km from the property. The nearest airport is Budapest Ferenc Liszt International Airport, 12 km from the hotel.
